translation: One should not, O Arjuna, abandon the duty to which one is born, though it may be faulty; for, all undertakings are enveloped by evil, just as fire is by smoke.
commentary: 18.48 Sahajam which is born? Karma action? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? Sadosham with fault? Even even? Not not? Tyajet (one) should abandon? All undertakings all undertakings? Hi for? by fault by evil? Smoke by smoke? Agni: fire? Iv like? covered are enveloped.Commentary Sahajam Born with oneself born with the birth of man.Sadosham Faculty for everything is constituted of the three Gunas.All undertakings Ones own as well
